articles.title: Why Vivek Ramaswamy Dropped Out Of US Presidential Race And Endorsed Trump - NDTV
articles.description: Indian-American Republican entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy on Tuesday announced he would be pulling out of the 2024 presidential race and will endorse former president Donald Trump, who registered a landslide victory in the Iowa caucus.
articles.content:
The 38-year-old, who has never held elective office, was self-funding his campaign.
